messages.subject: Re:bedtime decisions  ..Thanks :)
messages.msgSnippet: Thanks for all who shared what they do at bedtimes. I am new to unschooling and somehow got the impression that I shouldn t have anymore rules ...about
messages.messageBody:
Thanks for all who shared what they do at bedtimes. I am "new" to
unschooling and somehow got the impression that I shouldn't have anymore rules ...about
anything.
But I understand now...after reading so much on unschooling.com and
sandradodd.com..that one gets rid of RULES but instead lives by PRINCIPLES.
Unschooling is so refreshing!

Thanks again!
~Marcia...who is reading The Unprocessd Child right now and loving it!


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
